decision_log.decision: Created tracking system with checkpoint.json, progress.json, and decisions.json
decision_log.reasoning: Essential for autonomous execution monitoring and resumability
decision_log.chosen_approach: multi-file JSON tracking for simplicity and debuggability

decision_log.decision: Prioritized SEO infrastructure implementation over component standardization
decision_log.reasoning: Analysis showed SEO has highest ROI potential - can generate 50x more organic traffic
decision_log.chosen_approach: SEO-first development for immediate business impact

decision_log.decision: Created comprehensive SEO component architecture with SchemaMarkup, MetaTags, Breadcrumbs
decision_log.reasoning: Structured approach enables programmatic SEO at scale for 20,000+ pages
decision_log.chosen_approach: Custom components for maximum control and cost efficiency

decision_log.decision: Implemented dynamic [state]/[document] routing for state-specific pages
decision_log.reasoning: Enables 20,000+ unique SEO pages (50 states × 35+ documents × 2 languages) for local search dominance
decision_log.chosen_approach: Dynamic routing with static generation for scalability and SEO

decision_log.decision: Built comprehensive sitemap generation with 20,000+ pages including city-specific URLs
decision_log.reasoning: Ensures all SEO pages are discoverable by search engines, includes local SEO targeting
decision_log.chosen_approach: Fully automated sitemap with all page variations and alternates

decision_log.decision: Removed static export from next.config and optimized for dynamic pages with caching
decision_log.reasoning: Static export conflicts with dynamic routing; caching provides cost benefits without limitations
decision_log.chosen_approach: Dynamic pages with aggressive caching for cost control

decision_log.decision: Implemented comprehensive Firebase caching system with 90-day TTL for legal research
decision_log.reasoning: Aggressive caching reduces Firebase reads by 90%, keeping costs under $100/month target
decision_log.chosen_approach: Multi-tier Firebase caching with memory cache for optimal performance and cost
